# Padalec Library

A small python library with some useful tools.

## Table of Contents

- [Installation](#installation)
- [License](#license)
- [Contact](#contact)

## Installation

1. [Prerequisites](#prerequisites)
2. [Installation Steps](#installation-steps)

### Prerequisites

- Python 3.12.0

### Installation Steps

```bash
pip install padaleclib
```
